message.entry:
Could not connect to the board at {0}. Please check:
1: IP address, User name and Password are valid.
2: The board is powered up and connected to the network

Details:
{1}

Another process (PID: {0}) is using the TCP/IP port {1} selected for External mode communication. Either choose a different port number by opening Hardware Implementation > Target Hardware Resources > External mode pane or kill the process with PID {2}.
The model is configured for Raspberry Pi hardware, which does not support the building of AUTOSAR code.
Only one SDL Video Display is allowed in a model.
Build directory contains an invalid character. BuildDir property must be set to a valid Linux directory with only letters, numbers, and underscores separated by forward slashes.
Full build directory path not specified. Assuming BuildDir is relative to $HOME.
